items.title: Corporate Design: An Energizer Versus an Eyesore
items.abstract: While LG’s new headquarters would mar views of the New Jersey Palisades, Samsung’s new building is a boon to its city, San Jose, Calif.

items.title: The Dead Hand Versus the Invisible Hand, Urban Edition
items.abstract: Doing urbanization as the Romans did — or not.

items.title: San Francisco Is Changing Face of AIDS Treatment
items.abstract: The city that was once the epidemic’s ground zero now has only a few hundred new cases a year, the result of a raft of creative programs.

items.title: Barcelona and Manchester City to Meet
items.abstract: The teams have cross-pollinated talent, and they share similar styles, favoring attack over defense, which should translate to goals at both ends.

items.title: A Playful, French Take on a Classic Notebook
items.abstract: Vahram Muratyan, known for his “Paris versus New York” illustration, designed a series of notebooks for Smythson.
